_source.short_desc: ConnectWise Manage helps you organize your business around one centralized system, so your organization can easily connect.
_source.long_desc: Made for companies that sell, service, and support technology, ConnectWise Manage is the #1 business management platform worldwide. Today, more than 100,000 users rely on ConnectWise Manage to achieve greater accountability, operational efficiency, and profitability. The platform fully integrates business-process automation, help desk and customer service, sales, marketing, project management, cloud services and business analytics that dramatically streamline a company's operations.
_source.target_audience: Made for companies that sell, service, and support technology- from managed service providers and cloud service providers to managed print, VOIP, VARs.

category_features.name: Asset Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor assets (i.e. equipments, tools, software, hardware, etc.) lifecycle and usage from acquisition to retirement

category_features.name: Availability Management
category_features.definition: Monitor and analyze availability issues to help design and plan the improvement of service availability

category_features.name: Change Management
category_features.definition: Track and monitor efficient handling of all IT service changes/transitions

category_features.name: Configuration Management
category_features.definition: Identify and maintain components (i.e. servers, configuration information, software, etc.) and their relationships across all service

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and maintain contracts/licenses that come with procured products or services to ensure they are adhered to

category_features.name: Incident Management
category_features.definition: Identify, resolve and restore unplanned service failures/disruptions or injuries

category_features.name: Problem Management
category_features.definition: Identify and solve underlying cause of incident(s), and prevent future incidents from occurring

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Release Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate the testing/deployment of IT service releases (i.e. service changes)

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Alerts / Escalation
category_features.definition: System notifications about the need to bump priority level of ticket

category_features.name: Automated Routing
category_features.definition: Tickets are automatically assigned to specific agents based on predefined rules

category_features.name: Customizable Branding
category_features.definition: Add customized logos and colors to the interface

category_features.name: Email Management
category_features.definition: Integrate with email such as Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, etc.

category_features.name: Knowledge Base Management
category_features.definition: Create, store and share information, data, and support articles in a centralized database

category_features.name: Macros/Templated Responses
category_features.definition: Templated responses for responding quickly to recurring support requests.

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Communication
category_features.definition: Allows support from multiple channels including email, live chat, phone, and social media.

category_features.name: Real-Time Chat
category_features.definition: Engage in direct, instant messaging

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Access a computer or data from a distant location

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Service Level Agreement (SLA) Management
category_features.definition: Establish and oversee Service-Level Agreements (SLAs) to ensure defined service and performance Commons are met

category_features.name: Social Media Integration
category_features.definition: Integrate with Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.

category_features.name: Ticket Management
category_features.definition: Tracks interactions and automates issue resolution process

category_features.name: Workflow Configuration
category_features.definition: Alter the default workflow to meet your organization's needs

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Capacity Management
category_features.definition: Monitor/analyze service demand and performance to plan for adequate resources to meet current/future business requirements

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: IT Reporting
category_features.definition: Assemble and deliver relevant data points for IT

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Issue Auditing
category_features.definition: Track and monitor past issues and issue changes

category_features.name: License Management
category_features.definition: Track and organize the number of licenses available to the organization

category_features.name: Maintenance Scheduling
category_features.definition: Schedule predetermined or ad hoc maintenance services and labor requests

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Access a computer or data from a distant location

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Backup and Recovery
category_features.definition: Create backups and provide methods to recover deleted/lost data

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Issue Management
category_features.definition: Identify and respond to unexpected problems or failures (ie. "negative events")

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Scheduling
category_features.definition: Plan availability and assign specific time slots for tasks and resources

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Client Portal
category_features.definition: A website and login for stakeholders to access information

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Time & Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Log and record hours worked and costs spent to assist in billing and invoicing

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer service solution.
related_products.features: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer support solution. On average, it increases customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: Service management requires complete asset visibility. Streamline operations with asset tracking trusted by thousands of organizations.
related_products.features: Transform service management with seamlessly integrated, cloud-based asset tracking for your help desk. Improve service delivery, speed issue resolution, reduce downtime, boost productivity for your team by tracking all IT assets and software licenses in a central database. Maintain complete visibility into your IT landscape with full asset lifecycle management, purchase orders, maintenance, usage optimization. Out-of-the-box integrations with Zendesk,Jira, SCCM,JAMF, and other platforms via API

related_products.short_desc: The customer support platform that ensures you understand customer needs, get to the root of their issues, and increase their happiness
related_products.features:
TeamSupport's customer-centric Support platform empowers businesses to do much more than just ticket management. 

Through extensive customer management tools, which include account trend analytics, satisfaction scoring, and more, Support enables you to understand your customers better - rather than only focusing on the ticket. This leads to improved customer relationships that enable you to grow your revenue, increase customer happiness, and reduce churn.

related_products.short_desc: Deliver mission critical service faster with Incident Management
related_products.features: Service Cloud 360, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers companies to drive seamless engagement across the entire customer journey. Address incidents quickly by ensuring your teams can identify, track, and fix issues with proven workflows. Give agents and service operations teams full visibility into incidents, cases, and customer data in a single workspace. Create an even better customer experience with Incident Management best practices built into the #1 service platform.

related_products.short_desc: SolarWinds Service Desk is a highly rated ITSM solution that helps IT teams resolve issues quickly and deliver faster, smarter services
related_products.features: SolarWinds Service Desk (previously Samanage) is an award-winning, highly rated ITSM solution. ITIL-compliant and powered by smart technology like AI, automations, and live chat, our service desk helps you achieve faster ticket resolutions, improve SLAs, and gain better visibility into your overall technology infrastructure. With SolarWinds Service Desk, you can deliver exceptional service experiences and drive better business outcomes.

related_products.short_desc: Online ITSM Service Desk with Incident, Problem, Change, Release & Asset Management, in addition to powerful ticketing & automation
related_products.features: Freshservice is an intelligent, right-sized ITSM solution that delivers exceptional employee experiences with an intuitive, scalable, no-code solution. With its state-of-the-art AI and ML capabilities, Freshservice helps organizations ease an IT agents workload and improve their productivity by automating mundane tasks. In addition to its AI capabilities, Freshservice is flexible and scalable enough to be used by both: companies relying on legacy systems and modern enterprises.

related_products.short_desc: SysAid helps IT work smarter, not harder, with ITSM service automation based on a decade of AI information. Try IT for free today.
related_products.features:
SysAid uses service automation to make IT work smarter, not harder. With a help desk that practically manages itself, millions of users around the world enjoy faster service, lighter workloads, and a way smoother service experience. It makes every aspect of ITSM so breezy and automatic, freeing up IT from the grind and instead, allowing them do the things your business really needs to keep going strong.
SysAid provides the fix that IT has so badly needed. 
Try IT for free today

related_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
related_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

related_products.short_desc: Atera is the ultimate all-in-one remote IT management solution for MSPs, IT consultants and IT departments. Try Atera for free today!
related_products.features: Atera offers a comprehensive solution for MSPs and IT Professionals. The platform provides one integrated solution: full remote monitoring and management (RMM), PSA, remote access, patch management, billing, reports, and so much more! Atera's disruptive pricing model also helps managed IT service providers scale their business while providing continued best-in-class service. All plans include unlimited devices, meaning you only pay per technician. Try Atera for free today!

related_products.short_desc: Cloud software that connects people, systems & data into a single view for visibility and actionable intelligence across operations.
related_products.features: PagerDuty, Inc. (NYSE:PD) is a leader in digital operations management. In an always-on world, organizations of all sizes trust PagerDuty to help them deliver a perfect digital experience to their customers, every time. Teams use PagerDuty to identify issues and opportunities in real time and bring together the right people to fix problems faster and prevent them in the future.

similar_products.features: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer support solution. On average, it increases customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

similar_products.short_desc: SummitAI helps enterprises dramatically reduce the cost and complexity of IT Management while improving efficiency and productivity.
similar_products.features:
SummitAI is a market-leading artificial intelligence-driven IT and Enterprise Service Management Solution that integrates IT Service Management (ITSM), Enterprise Service Management (ESM), IT Asset Management (ITAM), an AI-driven Digital Agent, and Service Automation in a single easy-to-use software suite.

SummitAI transforms the way enterprises work by offering consumer-grade, responsive digital workflows empowering employees with an anytime, anywhere service experience.

similar_products.short_desc: SysAid helps IT work smarter, not harder, with ITSM service automation based on a decade of AI information. Try IT for free today.
similar_products.features:
SysAid uses service automation to make IT work smarter, not harder. With a help desk that practically manages itself, millions of users around the world enjoy faster service, lighter workloads, and a way smoother service experience. It makes every aspect of ITSM so breezy and automatic, freeing up IT from the grind and instead, allowing them do the things your business really needs to keep going strong.
SysAid provides the fix that IT has so badly needed. 
Try IT for free today

similar_products.short_desc: HaloITSM brings everything you need for IT support into one centralised solution.
similar_products.features:
HaloITSM is a single, all-inclusive ITSM software solution. It will transform your current ways of working into intuitive, up-to-the-minute workflows, as well as give your teams the ability to deliver the very best service to customers and employees alike.

It wont just standardize your processes, but it will also deliver valuable analytics, so you can match your IT delivery to the true needs of your business, present, and future.

similar_products.short_desc: Help Desk Support Software and Asset Management Tool includes, Knowledgebase, SLA Management, Ticket Tracking, Inventory Management.
similar_products.features: ManageEngine ServiceDesk Plus is a Help Desk and Asset Management Software. It offers an Integrated Package with Incident Management(Trouble Ticketing), Asset Tracking, Purchasing, Contract Management, Self-Service Portal, and Knowledge Base at an Affordable Price Point. ServiceDesk Plus provides all that you need to have a Full-Fledged IT Help Desk and a Productive Help Desk Staff. ManageEngine ServiceDesk Plus is available in both On-Premise and On-Demand.

similar_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
similar_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

similar_products.short_desc: The next generation of PSA tool. Complete professional services automation package for software and services businesses.
similar_products.features: CloudBlue PSA (previously HarmonyPSA) supports the entire business lifecycle, from lead generation to contract renewal. It is designed and built specifically for software and services businesses, automating business functions in a single platform, available from the cloud on any device.

similar_products.short_desc: ChangeGear is an award-winning ITSM platform, recognized as 'best in class' by analysts like Gartner and Forrester.
similar_products.features: ChangeGear delivers a comprehensive solution with innovative IT Service Management capabilities, ITIL-based modules, self-service, cost-effective licensing. With a business-friendly interface, users can easily build, configure, automate, and deploy services enterprise-wide. ChangeGear takes the complexity out of IT and provides smarter tools, processes, and automation for delivering efficient IT service management. Available for change management to a complete service management solution.

similar_products.short_desc: ITIL-aligned service management software with KPI dashboard that helps track workload for each employee and assign tasks efficiently.
similar_products.features: TOPdesk cloud-based software helps companies offer better services to their customers. With easy-to-use ITSM software and over 20 years experience our software helps you manage incidents, create workflows, and keep track of configurations. Make your end users more self-reliant thanks to the Self-Service Portal. More than 4500 organisations worldwide already use TOPdesk to increase efficiency and improve customer satisfaction. Are you looking for service excellence? Let us be your guides.

similar_products.short_desc: Web Help Desk? is a web-based ticketing, IT asset, knowledge, and change management software that is easy to use.
similar_products.features: SolarWinds Web Help Desk is an on-premises IT help desk solution that streamlines your help desk operations with simple, affordable ticketing and asset management software. Benefit from automated ticketing management, change management, IT asset management, built-in knowledge base, SLA alerting, performance reporting, and more.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Complaint Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Complaint Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Complaint Management software helps to track, organize and resolve customer complaints and maximizes the productivity of the employees who deal with customers directly. These solutions are characterized by the ability to accurately capture, classify and route complaints, enabling communication across the team and insuring compliance. Complaint Management software is related to Customer Satisfaction software, Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Help Desk software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Help Desk tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Help Desk software enables organizations to respond more efficiently to users. Support software can aid in answering technical and functional questions by providing improved methodologies for ticket tracking, IT management and customer service support. Integrating these elements improves the ability of customer service departments to provide fast and effective support to employees, end users and customers. Help Desk solutions can also facilitate the flow of new information from users, contributing to an organization's existing knowledge base. Help Desk software is related to Call Center software and Customer Service software .

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Issue Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Issue Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Issue Tracking software helps organizations monitor, manage and resolve issues in a variety of departments, from Financials to Help Desk. These applications keep track of tasks from capture to resolution, producing reports, enforcing compliance and optimizing business resources. Issue Tracking software is often web-based and compatible with other software applications. For related solutions see Bug Tracking software, Complaint Management software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top IT Service software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of IT Service tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: IT Service software helps IT service providers to sell, implement, deliver and bill their services by automating field services and technician management. IT Service solutions are often ITIL compatible, flexible and customizable and are designed to allow organizations to focus on delivering service while at the same time reducing their overhead. For related software solutions see Service Dispatch software and Field Service Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Remote Monitoring and Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Remote Monitoring and Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Remote Monitoring and Management or RMM software is widely used by managed services providers to perform monitoring, maintenance and troubleshooting for their clients' IT systems.

_source.short_desc: ConnectWise Manage Help Desk: Powerful ticketing system with centralized communication & integrates with tools you currently use.
_source.long_desc: Streamline your client service processes with ConnectWise Manages powerful help desk platform. ConnectWise Manage leverages our proprietary and market-leading ticketing system, which allows technology solution providers to provide best-in-class support to their customers. ConnectWise Manage's help desk platform and ticketing system enables your team to receive, process, and respond to service requests quickly and efficiently.
_source.target_audience: Made for companies that sell, service, and support technology- from managed service providers and cloud service providers to managed print, VOIP, VARs.

related_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer service solution.
related_products.features: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer service solution. On average, it increases customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

related_products.short_desc: Freshdesk is an easy-to-use customer service software that helps over 50,000 businesses worldwide create stellar customer experiences.
related_products.features: Freshdesk is a cloud-based helpdesk system that offers powerful solutions for customer service. Freshdesk unifies conversations from email, phone, web, chat and social, and helps you resolve issues across channels effortlessly. With Freshdesk, you can also automate workflows, offer convenient self-service options, manage SLAs, and generate reports. Freshdesk is used by over 50,000 customers, including Bridgestone, HP, Harvard University and DHL.

related_products.short_desc: Provide exemplary customer service with Zoho Desk's multichannel, multi-department capabilities and powerful AI assistant, automations.
related_products.features: Zoho Desk is the award-winning, context-aware help desk software along with multichannel capabilities. Zoho Desk packs advanced multi-stakeholder process management, embeddable self-service, a powerful AI assistant and brings together all the tools and context your teams need to deliver great customer service. Zoho brings decades of experience in building, deploying, maintaining, and supporting on-premise and cloud software. Our free plan gives you 3 users free to head start your operations

related_products.short_desc: Start for Free with LiveAgent and provide excellent customer service with the ultimate help desk solution for companies of all sizes.
related_products.features:
LiveAgent is a fully-featured help desk software that helps you bring personalization to your customer interactions.

Streamline all communication channels and manage them from a single shared company inbox. Enjoy social media integrations, unlimited ticket browsing history, call recordings, hybrid ticket streams, and more.

Join companies like BMW, Yamaha and Huawei in delivering world class customer service.

Start with a 14-Day trial, no credit card needed, no contracts.

related_products.short_desc: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools.
related_products.features: Intercom enables personalized customer service at scale, increasing customer satisfaction and support team efficiency. Powered by a modern messenger, smart automation and self-service tools, along with all the features you need from a modern support solution including a next-gen omnichannel inbox, conversation routing, workload management, reporting and more.

related_products.short_desc: Easy to implement web-based Customer Service software with a focus on B2B customer management and team collaboration.
related_products.features: TeamSupport is a post-sale customer support software solution built specifically for the unique needs of B2B technology-enabled companies. Built around the entire B2B customer, rather than a focus on each individual contact or ticket, TeamSupport helps solve for sophisticated client needs, fuels successful client interactions, and ultimately results in increased lifetime customer value. Nationally recognized TeamSupport suite of solutions includes TeamInsights, and TeamSuccess.

related_products.short_desc: Service Cloud 360, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers companies to drive seamless engagement across the entire customer
related_products.features: Service Cloud 360, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers companies to drive seamless engagement across the entire customer journey. Every interaction, from messaging and phone to video and in-person, is powered by intelligent automation and collaborative employee experiences. With unified data across every department, Service Cloud 360 enables Trailblazers worldwide to have a complete view of every customer and take engagement to the next level.

related_products.short_desc: SolarWinds Service Desk is an easy to use and affordable help desk solution that streamlines ticket resolution with automation and AI.
related_products.features: SolarWinds? Service Desk is a cloud-based, IT help desk solution that has helped organizations reduce cost per ticket by up to 15% and issue resolution time by up to 48% with smart ticket routing, automated workflows, and integrated asset management. This, plus an AI-powered knowledge base, can equip your employees with the resources needed to solve problems quickly. Set up can be done in days instead of months & can fit seamlessly into your business by integrating with 200+ cloud applications.

related_products.short_desc: Bitrix24 #1 free helpdesk and contact center software that comes with CRM. Used by 8 million companies in cloud and on-premise.
related_products.features: Bitrix24 is #1 free helpdesk and contact center software that comes with CRM. Used by 8 million companies in cloud and on-premise (open source code access). Our free omnichannel contact center allows you to communicate with your clients via email, phone, live chat, social networks and mobile messengers. 100% free for teams up to 12 support agents.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud contact center software that offers VR, skills-based routing, AI, call blending, and analytics.
related_products.features: With NICE CXone, you get a help desk that grows with you and never goes out of date. You'll always be on the most recent version of our software updates are free as are the continuously-flowing new service features. Give your customers a world-class support experience each and every time.

related_products.short_desc: Download free IT help desk software for IT pros & sysadmins around the world in all businesses. Support & mobile apps also free.
related_products.features: The Spiceworks IT Help Desk is purpose-built for IT pros, we have just what you need to run a better internal IT help desk and a better business. Start tackling tickets in minutes with free help desk software (on your server or in the cloud). Plus, it's more than just ticket tracking: understand (and change!) team behavior and articulate your value to the business. Get it free today!

similar_products.short_desc: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer service solution.
similar_products.features: Zendesk offers the industry leading customer service solution. On average, it increases customer satisfaction by 25% and agent productivity by 30% at any scale. All your customer interactions live in a single, dynamic interface with features like web widgets, pre-defined ticket responses, and a full customer history. Get up and running quickly, and expect to see results even faster.

similar_products.short_desc: SolarWinds Service Desk is an easy to use and affordable help desk solution that streamlines ticket resolution with automation and AI.
similar_products.features: SolarWinds? Service Desk is a cloud-based, IT help desk solution that has helped organizations reduce cost per ticket by up to 15% and issue resolution time by up to 48% with smart ticket routing, automated workflows, and integrated asset management. This, plus an AI-powered knowledge base, can equip your employees with the resources needed to solve problems quickly. Set up can be done in days instead of months & can fit seamlessly into your business by integrating with 200+ cloud applications.

similar_products.short_desc: Freshdesk is an easy-to-use customer service software that helps over 50,000 businesses worldwide create stellar customer experiences.
similar_products.features: Freshdesk is a cloud-based helpdesk system that offers powerful solutions for customer service. Freshdesk unifies conversations from email, phone, web, chat and social, and helps you resolve issues across channels effortlessly. With Freshdesk, you can also automate workflows, offer convenient self-service options, manage SLAs, and generate reports. Freshdesk is used by over 50,000 customers, including Bridgestone, HP, Harvard University and DHL.

similar_products.short_desc: Provide exemplary customer service with Zoho Desk's multichannel, multi-department capabilities and powerful AI assistant, automations.
similar_products.features: Zoho Desk is the award-winning, context-aware help desk software along with multichannel capabilities. Zoho Desk packs advanced multi-stakeholder process management, embeddable self-service, a powerful AI assistant and brings together all the tools and context your teams need to deliver great customer service. Zoho brings decades of experience in building, deploying, maintaining, and supporting on-premise and cloud software. Our free plan gives you 3 users free to head start your operations

similar_products.short_desc: (Gamified Helpdesk + Asset Management) - the complications = Freshservice. Plus, the service desk is ITIL-ready too!
similar_products.features: Freshservice is an online IT Helpdesk with a fresh twist. The tool puts a refreshing user experience on top of powerful ticketing and asset management capabilities like auto-discovery of new resources, powerful configuration management and enhanced impact analysis. Incident, Problem, Change, Release & Knowledge Management are amongst the other features that make Freshservice, a perfect fit for your organization's IT management needs.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy to implement web-based Customer Service software with a focus on B2B customer management and team collaboration.
similar_products.features: TeamSupport is a post-sale customer support software solution built specifically for the unique needs of B2B technology-enabled companies. Built around the entire B2B customer, rather than a focus on each individual contact or ticket, TeamSupport helps solve for sophisticated client needs, fuels successful client interactions, and ultimately results in increased lifetime customer value. Nationally recognized TeamSupport suite of solutions includes TeamInsights, and TeamSuccess.

similar_products.short_desc: Increase customer satisfaction and team efficiency with Intercom's market-leading messenger, smart automation and self-service tools.
similar_products.features: Intercom enables personalized customer service at scale, increasing customer satisfaction and support team efficiency. Powered by a modern messenger, smart automation and self-service tools, along with all the features you need from a modern support solution including a next-gen omnichannel inbox, conversation routing, workload management, reporting and more.

similar_products.short_desc: SysAid helps IT work smarter, not harder, with Help Desk automation based on a decade of AI information. Try IT for free today.
similar_products.features:
"SysAid uses service automation to make IT work smarter, not harder. With a help desk that practically manages itself, millions of users around the world enjoy faster service, lighter workloads, and a way smoother service experience. It makes every aspect of ITSM so breezy and automatic, freeing up IT from the grind and instead, allowing them do the things your business really needs to keep going strong.
SysAid provides the fix that IT has so badly needed. 
Try IT for free today."

similar_products.short_desc: Jira Service Management is an ITSM software that unlocks high-velocity teams to deliver great service experiences fast and together.
similar_products.features: Jira Service Management is an ITSM solution that unlocks high-velocity IT, dev, operations, and business teams. Empowered teams can deliver great service experiences, without the complexity of traditional ITSM, and coordinate efforts for even more impact through Jira's open collaborative platform. Streamlined workflows, automation rules, queues, SLAs, and a self-service portal all empower IT, dev, operations, and business teams to deliver exceptional service management at scale with no silos.

similar_products.short_desc: Service Cloud 360, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers companies to drive seamless engagement across the entire customer
similar_products.features: Service Cloud 360, the world's #1 customer service platform, empowers companies to drive seamless engagement across the entire customer journey. Every interaction, from messaging and phone to video and in-person, is powered by intelligent automation and collaborative employee experiences. With unified data across every department, Service Cloud 360 enables Trailblazers worldwide to have a complete view of every customer and take engagement to the next level.

similar_products.short_desc: ConnectWise Manage Help Desk: Powerful ticketing system with centralized communication & integrates with tools you currently use.
similar_products.features: Streamline your client service processes with ConnectWise Manages powerful help desk platform. ConnectWise Manage leverages our proprietary and market-leading ticketing system, which allows technology solution providers to provide best-in-class support to their customers. ConnectWise Manage's help desk platform and ticketing system enables your team to receive, process, and respond to service requests quickly and efficiently.

similar_products.short_desc: Front is how companies scale customer communication, combining the automation of ticketing software with the personal touch of email.
similar_products.features: Yes-you can scale and keep the human touch. Front is a customer communication hub that brings every channel into a single platform, combining the automation of ticketing software with the personal touch of email. Workflow automations and integrations help teams craft personalized replies, faster. Analytics help leaders track team and customer metrics like never before. Customer service teams of 5 and 5,000 alike use Front to scale their communication without sacrificing speed or efficiency.

similar_products.short_desc: Ninja ticketing is a flexible and easy-to-use IT helpdesk solution with robust automations that make technicians more efficient.
similar_products.features:
NinjaOne simplifies IT operations, enabling overburdened IT teams to efficiently manage their entire IT portfolio and support end users from anywhere.

Ninja ticketing is a flexible and easy-to-use IT helpdesk solution with robust out-of-box automations that ensure your technicians spend more time fixing issues than managing tickets. 

By combining ticketing with endpoint management, backup, and documentation, NinjaOne unifies your support workflow and makes your helpdesk more efficient.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Complaint Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Complaint Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Complaint Management software helps to track, organize and resolve customer complaints and maximizes the productivity of the employees who deal with customers directly. These solutions are characterized by the ability to accurately capture, classify and route complaints, enabling communication across the team and insuring compliance. Complaint Management software is related to Customer Satisfaction software, Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contact Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contact Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contact Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer requests across different communication channels.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Relationship Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Relationship Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Relationship Management (CRM) software enables customer interaction, support and relationship management. The purpose of a CRM application is to enable organizations to better manage their customers through the introduction of reliable systems, processes and procedures. Customer Relationship Management software integrates organizational processes across marketing, sales and customer services. CRM software is related to Contract Management software and Online CRM software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Customer Service software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Customer Service tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Customer Service software enables an organization to manage and track customer relationships and support services. From trouble ticket tracking to complaint resolution reporting, Customer Service software solutions allow organizations to manage and assess the quality of their interactions with customers. Customer Service applications also assist in the management and distribution of an internal knowledge base, providing customer service representatives with the information necessary to resolve customer complaints. Customer Service software is related to Call Center software, Help Desk software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Issue Tracking software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Issue Tracking tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Issue Tracking software helps organizations monitor, manage and resolve issues in a variety of departments, from Financials to Help Desk. These applications keep track of tasks from capture to resolution, producing reports, enforcing compliance and optimizing business resources. Issue Tracking software is often web-based and compatible with other software applications. For related solutions see Bug Tracking software, Complaint Management software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top ITSM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of ITSM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: ITSM software, also known as Information Technology Service Management software, focuses on management of internal and external IT support. These applications guide IT organizations through the planning, design, development, delivery, and support of their services. ITSM solutions encompass such areas as Help Desk and IT Service.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Knowledge Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Knowledge Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Knowledge Management software offers ways to optimize the utility of intellectual capital and intangible assets by capturing, preserving and organizing institutional knowledge in a measurable format. Knowledge Management solutions allow successful strategies to be transferred and replicated throughout an organization. Implementation can be inwardly focused on faster learning, new knowledge creation, and innovation or directed outwardly, providing a self-guided service path for customers. Knowledge Management software is related to Business Intelligence software and Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Live Chat software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Live Chat tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Live Chat software helps organizations connect with their customers in real time. Live Chat applications can be used for customer support, lead generation, and customer engagement. This type of software includes widgets that can be integrated into existing websites, as well as more robust stand alone solutions that allow businesses to track customer interactions, response and conversion rates.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Online CRM software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Online CRM tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Online CRM software enables web-based customer interaction, support and relationship management. Online customer relationship management applications provide customers with access to an organization's knowledge base assets, allowing customers to pursue a self-guided path to resolving product-related issues, either via the web or over the phone. Online CRM solutions can help increase the efficiency and utility of a call center, website or help desk by empowering customers to resolve issues on their own without engaging with customer service staff. Online CRM software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

_source.short_desc: The #1 business management platform worldwide for companies that sell, service, and support technology.
_source.long_desc: Made for companies that sell, service, and support technology, ConnectWise Manage is the #1 business management platform worldwide. Today, more than 100,000 users rely on ConnectWise Manage to achieve greater accountability, operational efficiency, and profitability. The platform fully integrates business-process automation, help desk and customer service, sales, marketing, project management, cloud services and business analytics that dramatically streamline a company's operations.
_source.target_audience: Made for companies that sell, service, and support technology- from managed service providers and cloud service providers to managed print, VOIP, VARs.

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing
category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Client Portal
category_features.definition: A website and login for stakeholders to access information

category_features.name: Collaboration Tools
category_features.definition: Provides a channel for team members to share media files, communicate, and work together

category_features.name: Document Management
category_features.definition: Collect, upload, store, and share all documents in a centralized location making it easier for everyone involved to access information

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Time & Expense Tracking
category_features.definition: Log and record hours worked and costs spent to assist in billing and invoicing

category_features.name: Alerts / Escalation
category_features.definition: System notifications about the need to bump priority level of ticket

category_features.name: Automated Routing
category_features.definition: Tickets are automatically assigned to specific agents based on predefined rules

category_features.name: Customizable Branding
category_features.definition: Add customized logos and colors to the interface

category_features.name: Email Management
category_features.definition: Integrate with email such as Gmail, Outlook, Yahoo, etc.

category_features.name: Knowledge Base Management
category_features.definition: Create, store and share information, data, and support articles in a centralized database

category_features.name: Macros/Templated Responses
category_features.definition: Templated responses for responding quickly to recurring support requests.

category_features.name: Multi-Channel Communication
category_features.definition: Allows support from multiple channels including email, live chat, phone, and social media.

category_features.name: Real-Time Chat
category_features.definition: Engage in direct, instant messaging

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Access a computer or data from a distant location

category_features.name: Reporting/Analytics
category_features.definition: View and track pertinent metrics

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Service Level Agreement (SLA) Management
category_features.definition: Establish and oversee Service-Level Agreements (SLAs) to ensure defined service and performance Commons are met

category_features.name: Social Media Integration
category_features.definition: Integrate with Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, etc.

category_features.name: Ticket Management
category_features.definition: Tracks interactions and automates issue resolution process

category_features.name: Workflow Configuration
category_features.definition: Alter the default workflow to meet your organization's needs

category_features.name: Access Controls/Permissions
category_features.definition: Define levels of authorization for access to specific files/folders

category_features.name: Alerts/Notifications
category_features.definition: Alerts/notifications within the system

category_features.name: Capacity Management
category_features.definition: Monitor/analyze service demand and performance to plan for adequate resources to meet current/future business requirements

category_features.name: Compliance Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage non-adherence to policies in a service, product, process, or supplier behavior

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: IT Reporting
category_features.definition: Assemble and deliver relevant data points for IT

category_features.name: Inventory Management
category_features.definition: Track and manage the quantity of resources on hand to maintain proper supply

category_features.name: Issue Auditing
category_features.definition: Track and monitor past issues and issue changes

category_features.name: License Management
category_features.definition: Track and organize the number of licenses available to the organization

category_features.name: Maintenance Scheduling
category_features.definition: Schedule predetermined or ad hoc maintenance services and labor requests

category_features.name: Patch Management
category_features.definition: Install software updates and bug fixes remotely

category_features.name: Remote Access/Control
category_features.definition: Access a computer or data from a distant location

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and access client/customer contracts

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Asset Tracking
category_features.definition: Monitor assets (i.e. equipments, tools, software, hardware, etc.) lifecycle and usage from acquisition to retirement

category_features.name: Availability Management
category_features.definition: Monitor and analyze availability issues to help design and plan the improvement of service availability

category_features.name: Change Management
category_features.definition: Track and monitor efficient handling of all IT service changes/transitions

category_features.name: Configuration Management
category_features.definition: Identify and maintain components (i.e. servers, configuration information, software, etc.) and their relationships across all service

category_features.name: Contract/License Management
category_features.definition: Track, store, and maintain contracts/licenses that come with procured products or services to ensure they are adhered to

category_features.name: Incident Management
category_features.definition: Identify, resolve and restore unplanned service failures/disruptions or injuries

category_features.name: Problem Management
category_features.definition: Identify and solve underlying cause of incident(s), and prevent future incidents from occurring

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

category_features.name: Release Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate the testing/deployment of IT service releases (i.e. service changes)

category_features.name: Self Service Portal
category_features.definition: Gateway through which end users can access the system

category_features.name: Backup and Recovery
category_features.definition: Create backups and provide methods to recover deleted/lost data

category_features.definition: Create and manage monetary interactions between parties (ie. bills and invoices)

category_features.name: CRM
category_features.definition: Contact and lead management to track interactions and notes about clients and prospects

category_features.name: Dashboard
category_features.definition: An assembly of graphs and charts for tracking statistics and metrics

category_features.name: Issue Management
category_features.definition: Identify and respond to unexpected problems or failures (ie. "negative events")

category_features.name: Live Chat
category_features.definition: Ability to chat online in real time

category_features.name: Project Management
category_features.definition: Plan and coordinate all the resources, costs and time needed to execute assignments

related_products.short_desc: Asana is the easiest way to organize and manage all of your team's work. See why 9,000+ customers give Asana 4.5 out of 5 stars.
related_products.features: Asana is a professional services automation tool that helps teams orchestrate their work, from daily tasks to strategic initiatives. With Asana, you can connect all your work in one place and bring teams together, anywhere. From lists to boards, to calendars and gantt charts, organize work your way. Join more than 114,000 paying organizations and millions of teams across 190 countries who use Asana to get more done. Get started in minutes to try Asana.

related_products.short_desc: Create custom and automatic workflows to streamline your team's processes with monday.com's open platform.
related_products.features: The easiest way to boost productivity, monday.com Work OS is the real-time source of truth your team can depend on for all of their everyday processes. No-code automations let you put your team's workflow on autopilot so that they can focus on meaningful work. Meanwhile, custom alerts, automatic status updates, and project flows will keep your team aligned on priorities so that you never miss your deadlines.

related_products.short_desc: Smartsheet is an online work execution platform empowering organizations of all sizes to plan, manage, automate, and report on work.
related_products.features: Smartsheet enables agility via automation - No code required! Create powerful automated workflows with simple rules any business user can create, without a single line of code, complex formulas, or help from IT. Smartsheet is the best way to plan, track, automate, and report on work.

related_products.short_desc: Wrike is a professional services automation software with templates, time tracking, Gantt charts, Kanban boards, reports, and more.
related_products.features: Wrike is a powerful professional services software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Create a streamlined digital workplace using custom request forms, Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, real-time updates, and performance reports all in one place that can be shared company-wide. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications to automate your everyday processes. Customize workflows and reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates, and more. Delight clients with every project.

related_products.short_desc: ClockShark is the leading mobile GPS time tracking & scheduling software for local construction, field service, and contractors.
related_products.features: ClockShark is the leading mobile GPS time tracking and scheduling software built for field service, contractors and construction businesses that want a simpler way to track employee time, run payroll quickly and accurately, and understand job costs. Over 8,000 customers have replaced the hassle of paper timesheets with software that makes it easier to run their business and keeps accountants happy. Don't take our word for it, start a free trial today!

related_products.short_desc: Hubstaff has trusted time tracking and employee monitoring for remote and field teams. Scheduling, invoicing, reporting, payroll, more.
related_products.features: Fight inefficiency and work better with streamlined time tracking from Hubstaff. Track time through simple desktop, web, and mobile apps, then manage invoicing, reporting, and more through one dashboard. Hubstaff integrates with over 30 apps so your business can run more efficiently, including Jira, Asana, Github, Slack, and Paypal. See work happen in real-time, track location with GPS and geofences, identify roadblocks and keep moving forward. Available for Mac, Windows, Linux, iOS & Android.

related_products.short_desc: NetSuite PSA helps project-centric businesses around the world to increase revenue, decrease costs, and maximize cash flow.
related_products.features: NetSuite's Professional Services Automation (PSA) solution provides a comprehensive, end-to-end solution that helps you maximise your services business performance. With NetSuite's PSA solution, you will increase visibility into your professional services organisation, improve resource utilisation, streamline invoicing and billing, elevate on-time project delivery, and drive profitability.

related_products.short_desc: UiPath is Robotic Process Automation leader, with solutions delivered to top global companies, BPOs and Shared Services organizations.
related_products.features: The most advanced, scalable, extensible and sustainable solution for services firms to automate, schedule and manage all processes and resources in one place. This feature-rich automation software allows you to design your own workflows visually, with no scripting or coding. UiPath works with virtually any application and system, no matter the source or geography, and best of all, provides full auditing capabilities and advanced analytical reporting with out of the box customizable dashboards.

related_products.short_desc: Extend the capabilities of your accounting system to include expense management with Nexonia.
related_products.features:
Nexonia is a configurable expense management solution that eliminates manual reporting, ensures compliance, and helps control your T&E spend.

Customers choose Nexonia for:
- Tight integrations with ERP's and accounting systems
- Fast expense submissions with an easy to use mobile app
- Handles complex approval workflows

Nexonia's simple-to-use application is fully integrated with ERPs, credit cards, and other systems supporting a variety of businesses.

related_products.short_desc: Improve budgeting, project oversight, team communication, task management, resource management, invoicing, and project financials.
related_products.features:
BigTime gives your firm the visibility you need to operate more efficiently and maximize profits. From project creation to client payments, BigTime streamlines firm operations with intuitive budgeting, project management, and invoicing solutions that can be configured to automate even the most complex scenarios. 

With deep integrations across a range of accounting, CRM, and productivity tools, professional service firms can centralize all project data in a single location.

related_products.short_desc: Discover the top PSA software solution built by services professionals, for services professionals.
related_products.features: Discover the top PSA software solution purpose-built for services organizations with 50 to 5000+ employees. Kantata, formerly Mavenlink + Kimble, unifies resource management, project management, collaboration, financial management, and business intelligence all in one solution so you can do what you do best, only better. Experience better operational execution, greater business agility, improved financial performance, and increased user adoption with Kantata.

With deep integrations across a range of accounting, CRM, and productivity tools, professional service firms can centralize all project data in a single location.

similar_products.short_desc: Discover the top PSA software solution built by services professionals, for services professionals.
similar_products.features: Discover the top PSA software solution purpose-built for services organizations with 50 to 5000+ employees. Kantata, formerly Mavenlink + Kimble, unifies resource management, project management, collaboration, financial management, and business intelligence all in one solution so you can do what you do best, only better. Experience better operational execution, greater business agility, improved financial performance, and increased user adoption with Kantata.

similar_products.short_desc: Built for professional services organizations to optimize operations and delivery, drive better utilization and higher profits.
similar_products.features: Projector PSA is a cloud-based Professional Services Automation tool specifically designed for managing delivery organizations. Modules for Project Accounting, Project Delivery and Resource Management enable better profit margins, utilization rates and operational efficiency. Projector BI provides PSO specific analytics and intelligence to measure and manage at every level and model your future success. Projector's out of the box functionality supports multi-currency, multi-company capabilities.

similar_products.short_desc: Polaris harvests 100% accurate business data in real-time, does the heavy-lifting analysis, and provides recommendations for proactive
similar_products.features: Polaris helps services firms stop losing money by uncovering opportunities to increase utilization & profitability. It constantly harvests data from users & systems, creating a single source of truth thats 100% accurate and helps you operate in harmony across groups. Polaris makes it easy for you to make tough business decisions by analyzing real-time data & recommending the best possible choices for you to decide from - with exception-based proactive alerts you see only whats important to you

similar_products.short_desc: Ruddr is the Modern Professional Services Platform with an unmatched User Experience (UX) and price point.
similar_products.features: Ruddr is the simplest and most cost-effective Professional Services Automation product in the world. Our customers include IT services firms, offshore providers, marketing agencies, management consulting firms, staffing firms, and the like. Ruddr helps you manage clients, projects, budgets, tasks, resource allocations, time, expenses, utilization, invoices, revenue, gross margin, and Key Performance Indicators.

similar_products.short_desc: #1 Project Accounting Software. See all your time, expense, and project-based accounting data-financial and non-financial-in one place.
similar_products.features: Sage Intacct delivers operational and financial visibility for your entire business for improved automation, profitability and customer satisfaction. Consolidate resource management, simplify project time tracking with automation and mobile timesheets, and make data-based strategic decisions quicker all on one efficient platform that scales with your company.

similar_products.short_desc: NetSuite OpenAir PSA runs all your service delivery and project management processes on a single, real-time platform in the cloud.
similar_products.features: From resource management and project management, to time and expense tracking, project accounting, and billing and invoicing, NetSuite OpenAir Professional Services Automation (PSA) software empowers your entire professional services business to gain real-time insights, increase project profitability and maximize billable resource utilization to make informed, data-driven decisions from a single, cloud-based platform.

similar_products.short_desc: Wrike is a professional services automation software with templates, time tracking, Gantt charts, Kanban boards, reports, and more.
similar_products.features: Wrike is a powerful professional services software trusted by 20,000+ companies worldwide. Create a streamlined digital workplace using custom request forms, Kanban boards, Gantt charts, time tracking, real-time updates, and performance reports all in one place that can be shared company-wide. Integrate Wrike with 400+ applications to automate your everyday processes. Customize workflows and reduce the need for emails, meetings, status updates, and more. Delight clients with every project.

similar_products.short_desc: The next generation of PSA tool. Complete professional services automation package for software and services businesses.
similar_products.features: CloudBlue PSA (previously HarmonyPSA) supports the entire business lifecycle, from lead generation to contract renewal. It is designed and built specifically for software and services businesses, automating business functions in a single platform, available from the cloud on any device.

similar_products.short_desc: Track quotes, projects, resources, tasks, timesheets, margins and invoices. Connect office suites, Finance, CRM, Slack, Trello, Jira...
similar_products.features: VOGSY is the Connected ERP for the B2B Services Industry, and a part of the GAV International Group, itself boasting 35 years of ERP excellence in over 30 countries, VOGSY serves all B2B service industries including Marketing, Consulting, and Technology around the globe. Executives, managers, and other professionals working in sales, finance, operations, and project management can all get their jobs done faster and more easily with connected processes and data from VOGSY.

similar_products.short_desc: End-to-end professional services automation software for services-first businesses to streamline quote-to-cash and drive profitability.
similar_products.features: Planview Changepoint is an end-to-end professional services automation (PSA) solution that powers the entire services lifecycle from opportunity to billing, advancing operational effectiveness and delivering the visibility needed to maximize utilization, improve customer satisfaction, and increase profitability. Services orgs can optimize staffing levels using powerful capacity forecasting and planning capabilities and gain delivery confidence while generating profits from happy customers.

similar_products.short_desc: The #1 business management platform worldwide for companies that sell, service, and support technology.
similar_products.features: Made for companies that sell, service, and support technology, ConnectWise Manage is the #1 business management platform worldwide. Today, more than 100,000 users rely on ConnectWise Manage to achieve greater accountability, operational efficiency, and profitability. The platform fully integrates business-process automation, help desk and customer service, sales, marketing, project management, cloud services and business analytics that dramatically streamline a company's operations.

similar_products.short_desc: CV Partner is used by leading professional services firms to manage their CVs and Case Studies and to win more bids and proposals.
similar_products.features: CV Partner is a SaaS tool to automate how you manage CVs/Resumes and Case Studies for bids and proposals. With CV Partner, you can tailor your company's CVs and credentials for tenders, bids or RFPs. Also, the tool allow for effortless exporting of CVs and Case Studies to Word, PowerPoint and PDF, including client and bid specific templates. Companies who use CV Partner spend 50% less time updating CVs and Case Studies, and is used by leading brands in the professional services industry.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Accounting Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Accounting Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Accounting Practice Management software helps professional accountants manage workflow, communicate with their clients, and automate their daily processes.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Contract Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Contract Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Contract Management software automates the creation, tracking, and monitoring of contracts and agreements. Contract Management software also allows for the company-wide sharing of contract documents and management of differing document versions. These contract management applications often provide top-down control and monitoring of contract status, key dates, and personnel responsibilities. Contract Management software is related to Customer Relationship Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Project Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Project Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Project Management software automates task assignment, resource allocation and milestone tracking for all phases of a project. Project Management tools and systems may take one of several approaches: collaborative, when multiple people work on a project; top-down, when one person works on a project at a time; or integrated, when multiple aspects of the organization are involved. There are a variety of project management systems and tools that have been designed to fit your project needs. Project Management software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Time and Expense software, Web Collaboration software and Workforce Management software. Find the best project management software for your organization.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Proposal Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Proposal Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Proposal Management software helps companies manage the proposal and RFP process. Bidders may quickly create strong business proposals and responses to RFPs that are tailored to the needs of each proposal. This software is helpful in automating the more cumbersome aspects of proposal writing while maintaining a detailed and professional-looking document. Some Proposal Management software is also a good fit for companies that are soliciting proposals. In this case, the software helps to organize and evaluate various aspects of multiple proposals at once. Proposal Management software is related to Quoting software, Contract Management software, and Professional Services Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Time and Expense software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Time and Expense tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Time and Expense software automates the tracking of billable hours and reimbursement expenses. Time and Expense solutions can be used by organizations in professional services industries to monitor projects on a task and overall basis as well as billing rates so that the appropriate amount may be invoiced. Time and Expense applications can also be used for expense reporting by employees who travel frequently. Time and Expense software is related to Professional Services Automation software, Project Management software, Time Clock software and Workforce Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Workflow Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Workflow Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Workflow Management software coordinates the flow of work and ensures changes are properly implemented. Workflow Management systems offer a collaborative environment that allows businesses to easily monitor and evaluate their processes. Organizations use Workflow Management systems to coordinate their business environment, facilitate instant access to accurate and up-to-date data on projects and performance, schedule and synchronize changes and test the effectiveness of business strategies. Workflow Management software is related to Business Process Management software, Requirements Management software, and Project Management software.
